Something you know

May 1, 2013

Jetpants is an automation toolkit for handling monstrously large MySQL database topologies. It is geared towards common operational tasks like cloning slaves, rebalancing shards, and performing master promotions. It features a command suite for easy use by operations staff, though itâ€™s also a full Ruby library for use in developing custom migration scripts and database automation.
